purpose: To educate and provide resources for learning Python programming and its applications in fields like bioinformatics and web development.
principle: Utilizes Python scripts and Streamlit for creating interactive web applications, along with OpenAI APIs for AI-driven functionalities.
reusability: The tutorials can be reused by developers to learn and implement similar projects. The code is open-source under the MIT license, allowing for modification and redistribution.
limitations: Primarily focuses on Python and Streamlit; limited to the scope of tutorials provided. May require external dependencies for full functionality.
